justifications: Takuma Inoue (20-1, 5 KO), brother of Naoya, defend his bantamweight title against undefeated slugger Seiya Tsutsumi (11-0-2, 8 KO) in the main event.

references: second fight in under three months

justifications: Junto Nakatani (28-0, 21 KO) meets Petch Sor Chitpattana (76-1, 53 KO) for his second fight in under three months.
Takuma Inoue (20-1, 5 KO), brother of Naoya, defend his bantamweight title against undefeated slugger Seiya Tsutsumi (11-0-2, 8 KO) in the main event.
Junto Nakatani (28-0, 21 KO) meets Petch Sor Chitpattana (76-1, 53 KO) for his second fight in under three months.
